website_summaries.verdict: This Shiseido cream lives up to its name. Not only does it deliver outstanding hydration to thirsty skin, but it also boosts skin's underlying structure to revitalize it.  Moisturizes and firms for a younger-looking appearance.
pros: Made with the brand's Bio-Revitalizing Complex that's patented and proven to give skin a stronger and firmer appearance
Smooth, creamy texture is highly moisturizing, even for very dry skin
Produces noticeable results for many users
cons: High price for a fairly small amount of product
Feels slightly sticky, but this isn't a deal-breaker for most

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this moisturizer! Silky and smooth. The only negative was my jar had a big air pocket in it, so a chunk of lotion was missing. Otherwise 5 stars all around.
customer_reviews.author: Alanna

customer_reviews.title: Great 👍 product for your face
customer_reviews.text: I use it for my face I have been using for the last ten years and I love it
customer_reviews.author: Rose A

customer_reviews.title: Product appears to have been used!
customer_reviews.text: This jar was not sealed, a deep imprint in the center which appears that someone used it, no applicator, not in original box, no pamphlet from Sheseido. I thought I ordered it from a seller I used in Feb. but some how it was switched to NY Beauty LTD. It was returned. Otherwise, it is a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Gayle D. Quirk

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: Packing was great and so was price. The product is rich and creamy, but not heavy. Penetrates into the skin leaving a dewy sheen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite everyday mousturizer
customer_reviews.text: I use this everyday and my skin stays soft and wrinklefree
customer_reviews.author: L. Blaser

customer_reviews.title: Gentle cream that works well around my sensitive eye area
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that I can moisturize with this cream without causing the skin around my eyes to react to it. So many creams burn the skin there and this one doesn't, so I've purchased five or six jars over time. Can't go without it.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. KB

customer_reviews.title: Good Moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I like the item very much, it is a good moisturizer but it doesn’t even the skin tone. And also doesn’t help with acne. This thing is not cheap. The price is very high and this cream only do one thing
customer_reviews.author: Z k

customer_reviews.title: Lesson Learned
customer_reviews.text: Looked like the real thing until I started using. Smells differently and had immediate reaction after one usage. After reading reviews I realized that container should have been sealed and with pamphlet. Can't return as I started using after returned date.
customer_reviews.author: SweetF

customer_reviews.title: true
customer_reviews.text: It's true. It's the same as before. It was cheap this time. I'm so lucky
customer_reviews.author: pengwenyao

customer_reviews.title: Good for moisturing
customer_reviews.text: First time try this cream. I bought it because my skin gets dry recently, especially my forehead and nose. It did help moistured my forehead. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: xiao h.

customer_reviews.title: Great mositure!
customer_reviews.text: I use this product at night and in the winter daily. It brings moisture to my skin.
customer_reviews.author: D. anderson

customer_reviews.title: it feels great in the skin and leaves it felling smooth and ...
customer_reviews.text: Ecxellent product, it feels great in the skin and leaves it felling smooth and mouisture, I love it
customer_reviews.author: Nai Ross

customer_reviews.title: The best cream
customer_reviews.text: This is the best cream ever. Used more than 20 years. I also used cream from various brands, but this is still the best.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Awsome!
customer_reviews.text: This product is better than any I have tried and I Love it! Takes away bags around my eyes in seconds and takes years off my face!
customer_reviews.author: dds

customer_reviews.title: Love how it makes my skin feel and look
customer_reviews.text: This is miracle cream! Love how it makes my skin feel and look.
customer_reviews.author: Schelly Decker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love Shiseido products and Amazon is a fabulous place to purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Unadel Turner

customer_reviews.title: Japanese women really take excellent care of their skin
customer_reviews.text: Think about it.....Japanese women really take excellent care of their skin. I have used Shiseido for years....YOU skin will be amazingly soft & nourished. TOTALLY worth the price!!👍
customer_reviews.author: Patty Brown

customer_reviews.title: My mom is such a complicated person to buy for ...
customer_reviews.text: My mom is such a complicated person to buy for, but you can never go wrong with Shseido!!!! Even i sneak some when she isn't looking.
customer_reviews.author: Rosey J Angel

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: No secrets about this great product. The Shiseido product line is well known for quality. The price here was better than I could find anywhere else
customer_reviews.author: MyPick

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Received a box with another three samples. Better value than expected. Highly recommend. And expiration date will be 2 years later. I am sure I will finish it sooner
customer_reviews.author: JiaHao Liu

customer_reviews.title: Some of product missing
customer_reviews.text: I love Shiseido but this was not a great purchase. There was a deep swath of product was missing, maybe 10-12% hole down to the bottom of the jar. I contacted the seller who gave me the phone number of Shiseido as they claimed they do not open the product. Shiseido said they could not help because this was not an authorized seller. The seller then offered to replace the product but I was leaving and needed to take it so I just kept it. Shiseido products last me forever but this one seems to lighter and need to use more.
customer_reviews.author: BridgetCT

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I loved it It really works for a dry skin.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi Park

customer_reviews.title: It's from Shiseido's French company, I like it.
customer_reviews.text: It's from Shiseido's company in France. It's less perfume, and less greasy. I like it very much. Will order another two.
customer_reviews.author: Huafoley

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: Well packaged. Creamy and smooth on face. Leaves my face hydrated and smooth! I love Shiseido products!!
customer_reviews.author: Chiquitita

customer_reviews.title: Crappy Vendor Biolife - Stay Away
customer_reviews.text: The what is noramally a very nice silver Shisiedo box was smashed and closed with a piece of tape that had a speaker icon on it??? Crappy store, stay away from it.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Can not really rate because I gave it as a gift
customer_reviews.author: caesar

customer_reviews.title: otherwise love the
customer_reviews.text: Jars not full as expected , hole in center when I open, otherwise love the product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You can trust this brand
customer_reviews.text: Product I've used for several years. I think I see results from this trusted brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Shiseido Bio-Performance Advanced Super Revitalizing Cream, 1.7 Ounce
product_meta.description: Prevent the first stages of line formation with this richly textured, ultra-hydrating formulation Shiseido's patent-pending Bio-Revitalizing Complex reinforces skin's elastic fibers.
feature_bullets: How to use: To Use: Smooth evenly over face each morning and evening after cleansing and balancing. To ensure product purity, always use the specially provided spatula when taking cream from the jar
